solution_line_template: Cristian eats {white_cookies_eaten_fraction}*{initial_white_cookies} = <<{white_cookies_eaten_fraction}*{initial_white_cookies}={eaten_white_cookies}>>{eaten_white_cookies} white cookies from the jar, 3/4 of the total number of white cookies in the cookie jar.

The number of white cookies remaining in the cookie jar is {initial_white_cookies}-{eaten_white_cookies} =<<{initial_white_cookies}-{eaten_white_cookies}={remaining_white_cookies}>>{remaining_white_cookies}
In his cookie jar, Cristian also has {initial_white_cookies}+{more_black_cookies} = <<{initial_white_cookies}+{more_black_cookies}={initial_black_cookies}>>{initial_black_cookies} black cookies.

He eats {black_cookies_eaten_fraction}*{initial_black_cookies} = <<{initial_black_cookies}*{black_cookies_eaten_fraction}={eaten_black_cookies}>>{eaten_black_cookies} black cookies from the cookie jar.

He remains with {initial_black_cookies}-{eaten_black_cookies} = <<{initial_black_cookies}-{eaten_black_cookies}={remaining_black_cookies}>>{remaining_black_cookies} black cookies after eating half of them.

In total, Cristian has {remaining_black_cookies}+{remaining_white_cookies} = <<{remaining_black_cookies}+{remaining_white_cookies}={total_remaining_cookies}>>{total_remaining_cookies} cookies remaining in the jar.
